resources.string: You wake up in the middle of the street by a lamp post, not remembering a thing about last night and feeling a bit unwell.

You decided to head towards the cool breeze to freshen up. Cool was a mistake, it is way too cold in here. You should probably keep moving to stay warm. There are two roads, one leads to the woods nearby and the other one seems to lead to the mountains afar.
You headed towards the warmth radiating from the savannah. Your nether regions start to burn because of the hot ground. You\'d better move forward fast before you get roasted.

Wait a minute, these aren\'t mountains at all. Your mind seems to be playing games with you. You decide to enter the pyramid despite the omnious feeling you have. Inside you find a dimly lit chamber with a half-full beer can.
You have entered the disgustingly pleasant woods. You encounter a yellow bear wearing a red shirt who is kind enough to share some of his honey with you.
Maybe consuming that was not such a great idea after all. You feel sick and start to lose consciousness. It was a mistake.
Hey, this place looks familiar, you have found home at last! Time to drink a glass of water and get in a horizontal position. Finally you start to feel better.
You feel sick and go to the woods
It\'s important to stay hydrated. Gladly accept the drink
Currently even thinking of beer is nauseating. Leave the eerie place
Lol nope, let\'s get out of here
Asking for information and displaying welcome message
Download the official MetaWear app from Play Store and connect to your device to see the address. (Only letters A-F and numbers are accepted, example: CA:CF:B2:0E:44:36)

. This is an interactive story that requires actual walking around in real life. Are you ready to take a few steps to reach your destination? Take your MetaWear with you to see your character move around. Let\'s go!
User input value must be filled
What is your MetaWear MAC address?
To reach your destination walk until the progress bar on the bottom is full.
